collectible.title: Eichi's Tie
collectible.subtitle: Left behind by its owner, too frustrated when the game was over.
collectible.text: Part of the Yumenosaki Academy's uniform for 3rd years. A bit small and unremarkable, be careful not to forget it when you leave the Inventory! It's easy to leave it behind when you're thinking of something else.
collectible.unlock: Play a game where Eichi wins.
